post.text: Very proud of our next First Lady Melania Trump! #MakeAmericaSafeAgain

comment.author: Graham
comment.text: Two strong leaders, Donald & Melania Trump. Smart sharp and intelligent. You won't believe what they are going to accomplish together with us for us all. God be with you very moment.

replies.author: Lindsey
replies.text: Yeah, I can't believe they plagiarized. LOL
